foreign.translate: иностранный, зарубежный, внешний, чужой, инородный, чуждый, несоответствующий
examples: She has a foreign accent.
The name was foreign to me.
He spoke in a foreign tongue.
She doesn't enjoy foreign travel.
Foreign Office
Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States
America's foreign policy
a meeting of EU foreign ministers
I thought she sounded foreign.
US foreign and domestic policy
The film was named best foreign film.
The bank can supply you with foreign currency.
The tourist had a foreign accent.
Jealousy is foreign to her nature.
Can you speak any foreign languages?
All his capital is locked up in foreign companies.
Foreign influence began to filter into the country.
The Foreign Minister held talks with his Chinese counterpart.
He used to affect a foreign accent.
Foreign investment may dry up.
The ministry of foreign affairs
Foreign and Commonwealth Office
Foreign Operations Administration
We don't get many foreign visitors.
US foreign policy with regard to Cuba
Foreign Investment Review Agency
a harmful dependence on foreign oil
He oined the French Foreign Legion.
militarize a country's foreign policy
The foreign team upset the local team.
example_translate: Ей не нравятся зарубежные поездки. / Она не любит путешествовать за границей.

В страну начало проникать влияние иностранных государств.
